title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Activity networks, Introduction to Graph theory, Graph theoretic applications, Introduction to Project Networks, PERT/CPM models, Scheduling with limited resources, Network crashing, Precedence diagrams, Generalised activity networks, PERT/costs, Project feasibility, appraisal, and selection, Prospects and case studies.BooksÃ¢ÂÂ¢Projects: Planning, Analysis, Selection, Implementation
